Edith Labs

Quick Start

  1. Clone the repo:
git clone https://github.com/kevarifin14/edith-labs.github.io.git
  1. Confirm that you have npm installed. If you donâ€™t, follow the instruction on the npm site.
npm -v
  1. Make sure all package dependencies are installed:
npm install
  1. Start a local development server and go to localhost:8000.
gatsby develop
